snippet.title: Solitary Echoes - First Peek at Episode 2
snippet.description:
Thanks to everyone who played Episode 1 of Solitary Echoes so far. Also thanks so much for every kind word that reached us on various platforms! :3
Many wrote that they can't wait for Episode 2, so this video is for them: An exclusive first peek into the next episode!
Be aware that this level is still a work in progress - especially the sound design still needs lots of work. Also of course it's a gameplay spoiler. ;)
Hope you enjoy - feedback is always appreciated!

Download Episode 1 of Solitary Echoes here: https://www.moddb.com/mods/solitary-echoes/downloads/solitaryechoesv1-1

https://www.team-lambda.com/

Timeline:

Runner/Facehugger: (00:19)
Xenomorphs: (00:50)
Another Facehugger: (01:32)
Train: (02:20)
